titles.title: A bill to authorize the expansion of the Fort Davis National Historic Site in Fort Davis, Texas, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
9/8/2008--Introduced.
Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire additional acreage to increase the size of the Fort Davis National Historic Site near the town of Fort Davis, Texas, by acquiring certain land from willing sellers.
